column4: i know this is a /really/, really, bad question.. but is there a realplayer player for linux, or anything that will show a streaming realmedia format?
there is realplayer and mplayer with w32codecs can also play "real" media
that's not it, one sec let me find it
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/VNCOverSSH that's what I was looking for
oh, not sure how to set that up on windows.  Maybe someone else knows
